automat integr of a function with a paramet two efficimethod for automat numer integr ar romberg integr and adaptsimpson integr for integrand of the form f x gx a where a is a paramet it is shownthat romberg s method is more effici a fortran programshow how to achiev thi greater effici cacm novemb 1966rabinowitz p ca661106 jb march 2 1978 3 35 pm1040 4 1352 1352 4 1352 1352 4 1352 13524 1352 1352 4 1352 1352 4 1352 1352 41352 1352 4 1352 1352 4 1352 1352 4 13521352 4 1352 1352 4 1352 1356 4 1352 18834 1352 1982 4 1352 1982 4 1352 2040 41352 2040 4 1352 2040 4 1352 2040 4 13522048 4 1352 2048 4 1352 2048 4 1352 20744 1352 2074 4 1352 2074 4 1352 2074 41352 2093 4 1352 2093 4 1352 2093 4 13522093 4 1352 2415 4 1352 2550 4 1352 10405 1352 1092 5 1352 1241 5 1352 1273 51352 1352 5 1352 1352 5 1352 1352 5 1352324 5 1352 2040 5 1352 429 5 1352 5705 1352 621 5 1352 786 5 1352 834 51352 872 5 1352 1241 6 1352 1273 6 13521352 6 1352 1356 6 1352 324 6 1352 6216 1352
